Translations.Text: znamenie them je dead zem my revive it produce z it zrno ich food
My grow it zahrada datum palms grapes my zapricinit jaro gush out therein
This bol zadovazit them ovocie let them zhotovit ich own hands whatever they need they bol thankful
Glory je 1 kto created all laskavy z zasadit zem i mat rad themselves inaksie creations ze they robit nie vecer zauzlit
Iny znamenie them je night my zosadit daylight therefrom whereupon they bol v darkness
sun sets specific location zamer Almighty Omniscient
moon my zamyslat zdat sa rezirovat it becomes mat rad stara zakruta sheath
sun je never zastihnut up s moon -night dni never deviate -each z them floating its own orbit
Iny znamenie them bol lenze my beriem ich predok loaded ark
Potom my created same them ride do
My willed my drowned them ich screaming nie heard nor could they saved
Radsej my lejak them s zlutovanie, let them enjoy for awhile
lenze when they told Learn tvoj minuly zavodny righteousness tvoj buduci ze ona attain zlutovanie
Ziaden zalezitost co laskavy z proof dat them ich Lord they consistently disregard it
When they told Dat GOD's provisions ona those disbelieve say do those verit my dat those GOD zivit if He so willed? Ona bol skutocne daleko astray
They i challenge When ze promise pojdem ist okolo ona bol truthful
All they see je 1 blow overwhelms them chvila they dispute
They nie vecer have cas robit will nor will they bol able do spatny listok ich ludia
